definition: forehead/horizontal tablet or inscribed board/specified number or amount
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: The two parties also disagree on the time and quantum of raising the debt ceiling.
sentences.chinese: 兩黨還在提高債務最高限額的時間和額度上意見相左。

sentences.english: Others claim Kyoto compliance by buying carbon credits.
sentences.chinese: 其他則通過購買碳信用額度的方式來遵守京東議定。

sentences.english: Civil aviation flight quota has grown significantly and cargo transportation has increased steadily.
sentences.chinese: 民航飛越額度大幅增加，貨物運輸穩定增長。

sentences.english: Heavy selling triggered Beijing's limit on how much yuan banks can officially buy from or sell back to the mainland.
sentences.chinese: 拋售達到了北京對銀行向內地買賣的人民幣額度限制。

sentences.english: There is a limit on the amount of money you can withdraw from the ATM.
sentences.chinese: 從ATM機取款是有額度限制的。

sentences.english: Depending upon the loan amount, the appropriate service is selected and invoked.
sentences.chinese: 根據貸款額度的不同，將選擇並調用相應的服務。

sentences.english: They will have access to a line of credit from the Treasury, if needed.
sentences.chinese: 如果必要的話，他們將從財政部獲得最高貸款額度。

sentences.english: And it involves no ex-post conditionality.
sentences.chinese: 靈活信貸額度工具不涉及事後條款。

sentences.english: The amoun of investment necessary to reasonable restriction .
sentences.chinese: 對轉投資額度進行合理限制有其必要性。

sentences.english: Depending on the loan amount, the appropriate service is selected and invoked.
sentences.chinese: 根據貸款額度的不同，將選擇並調用相應的服務。

sentences.english: In addition, Obama gets a tax-free expense account worth $50,000.
sentences.chinese: 此外，他還有價值5萬美金的免稅支出額度。

sentences.english: Good records will prevent you from getting overdrawn at the bank or charging more than your credit limit.
sentences.chinese: 良好的記錄會讓你避免銀行透支或超出你的信用額度。

sentences.english: Market regulations of foreign exchange quotas and cash remittances are permitted, and prices are e changeable according t changes of the market.
sentences.chinese: 允許外匯額度和現匯進行市場調節，價格隨行就市。

sentences.english: How much is the limit for cash advance of my credit card?
sentences.chinese: 我的信用卡的取現額度是多少？

sentences.english: The third part is about to invest in the company's investment limit restrictions.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分是關於對公司轉投資的投資額度的限制。

sentences.english: There would also be limits on state subsidies and credit.
sentences.chinese: 此外，還有對國家補貼和信貸額度的限制。

definition: a loan/CL:筆|笔[bi3]/to provide a loan (e.g. bank)/to raise a loan (from e.g. a bank)
to settle a bill/to close an account
